head.title: Directive on Accounting Standards: GC 2700 Segment Disclosures

div.h1: Directive on Accounting Standards: GC 2700 Segment Disclosures

section.p: This document is part of the Appendix A of the Directive on Accounting Standards.

section.h2: C. Government of Canada Consolidated Financial Statements

ol.li: As permitted by PS 2700.30, inter‑segment transfers are measured at the exchange amount.

For the purposes of the Government of Canada consolidated financial statements, the government has determined that segmented information should be based on the ministry structure. This structure groups the activities of departments and agencies, Crown Corporations and other entities for which a Minister is responsible (PS 2700.07).
For Departmental Financial Statements, segmented information should be based on the Departmental Results Framework (PS 2700.07).
